vote.text: Amendment SA 3935 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3935 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Burr. Of a perfecting nature.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3935 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
